name: Alex Cary
review: This is a Great Camera. I love this one. Super lens, excellent battery backup.

name: Tylor Swift
review: It does not matter whether the light condition is bright or dark, the images clicked using DSLR always maintain quality. I love it.

name: Justin Bieber
review: Handy enough to carry around and you can capture pretty decent photos with it. You cannot take multiple types of images without dropping the quality.

name: katy Perry
review: TTL viewing shows the same view that of the lens that takes the picture. Which literally means, what you view is what you capture.

name: Shakib Al Hasan
review: Dust can sneak inside the camera body when we change the lenses. There is also software that can spot the dust in the images and eliminate dust automatically.

name: Selena Gomez
review: The focusing on this camera is not only fast but also accurate. It precisely focuses on the subject. You can put your camera in the auto-focus mode.
